state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Pantry =- You've just walked into a pantry. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a shelf. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. There is an open plain door leading north. > -= Pantry =-0/1

admissible_commands: put green hot pepper on shelf
put yellow bell pepper on shelf

next_state: -= Kitchen =- You arrive in a kitchen. An ordinary one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You smell a great smell, and follow it to a fridge. The fridge contains a cilantro, a green bell pepper, a green apple and a red bell pepper. You can make out a closed oven. You can make out a table. On the table you can make out a cookbook. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! What's that over there? It looks like it's a counter. You see a red apple and a knife on the counter. You see a stove. The stove appears to be empty. There is an open plain door leading south. There is an exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is not blocked by one. > -= Kitchen =-0/2

admissible_commands: cook green hot pepper with oven
cook green hot pepper with stove
cook yellow bell pepper with oven
cook yellow bell pepper with stove
insert green hot pepper into fridge
insert yellow bell pepper into fridge
put green hot pepper on counter
put green hot pepper on stove
put green hot pepper on table
put yellow bell pepper on counter
put yellow bell pepper on stove
put yellow bell pepper on table
take green bell pepper from fridge
take red bell pepper from fridge
